author: julianfoad
msg: Fix the setting of "dirent->has_props" over RA-DAV.
This caused "svn ls -v" to show all files as having no properties.
Subtract 1 from sizeof() to get the length of a constant string.

author: cmpilato
msg: warning/bug in revision 7379.  Thanks to Philip Martin for noticing.

author: philip
msg: Fix some more error leaks revealed by SVN_DEBUG_ERROR.

author: mbk
msg: Add a new RA vtable method: "get_repos_root", which allows clients to
determine the actual root of the repository associated with a particular
(serve): Send the repository root at the end of the handshake.
(ra_svn_open): Receive repository root at the end of the handshake.
(svn_ra_svn_conn_st): Added member to store repository root URL.
(svn_ra_session_t): Added member to store repository root URL.

author: julianfoad
msg: (svn_client__do_commit): Remove a description of arguments that were removed
(svn_io_open_unique_file): Fix description of suffixes. (Reported by Roman
